name: Youmu's Rampage
description:
Excuse-plot

Youmu has been possessed by a wolf spirit, and it wants her to kill as many otter/eagle ghosts as possible! Luckily the world is seemingly infinite. Funny how that works.
"How do you kill ghosts", you ask? Well...

Controls
  • [←][→]: Walk
  • [ ↑ ]: Jump
  • [ ↓ ]: Slide, get up again with [ ↑ ]
  • Midair + [ ↓ ]: Special move that makes you immobile but nets a huge score multiplier!
  • [esc]: Return to title.

In menus, use [ ↑ ][ ↓ ] to navigate, and [z] to confirm. Some options also allow [←][→].

Scoring

Eagle and Otter ghosts are worth 1000 points each. However, collecting many of the same type quickly increases their worth! The challenge is maintaining this combo; especially dodging the worthless wolf spirits the excuse-plot doesn't want you to murder ruthlessly.

It's a gamejam game.

Stage 1 works fine. Stage 2 exists but is broken/unfinished beyond belief. Luckily this is a three-day game-jam project I'll probably never look back at.

Special thanks:

  • ZUN (Touhou)
  • The guys hosting the game jam. (Hosting the game jam.)
  • Touhou Game Jam Discord (Helping the west join this jam, and basic translations)
  • Vernon Adams (His OFL-licensed Bangers font I'm overusing this project)
  • My sanity (Not getting completely depleted)
